snapshot-intervals.description: The interval (number of command hops) between two consecutive snapshots. This can be specified per-collection, apart from a default fallback.

event-coll-suffix.description: The suffix suffix of the (vertex) collection where events are stored.

snapshot-coll-suffix.description: The suffix suffix of the (vertex) collection where snapshots are stored.

command-coll-suffix.description: The suffix suffix of the (edge) collection where commands are stored.

event-snapshot-link-coll-suffix.description: The suffix suffix of the (edge) collection where event-snapshot links are stored.
